Title: AI Hospital: Benchmarking Large Language Models in a Multi agent Medical Interaction Simulator
Primary_Survey_Section: Multi agent simulation environments and collaborative clinical interaction
Key_Insight: Introduces a simulated hospital environment where diagnostic performance emerges from multi agent interaction and dispute based peer coordination rather than single agent reasoning.

Title: PathFinder: A Multi-Modal Multi-Agent System for Medical Diagnostic Decision-Making Applied to Histopathology
Key_Insight: Hierarchical multi-agent workflow that gates cases, iteratively collects evidence, and synthesizes diagnostic decisions with explanations

Title: AgentMD: Empowering language agents for risk prediction with large-scale clinical tool learning
Primary_Survey_Section: Tool-using clinical agents with symbolic execution
Key_Insight: AgentMD shows that a single centralized language agent coupled with executable clinical tools and hard symbolic verification can outperform pure language reasoning for clinical risk prediction.

Title: ENTAgents: AI Agents for Complex Knowledge Otolaryngology
Primary_Survey_Section: Hierarchical multi-agent clinical reasoning with supervisory control
Key_Insight: ENTAgents exemplifies a clinically oriented hierarchical agent architecture where a supervisor enforces iterative self-correction and information retrieval, highlighting how control and verification design shape reliability in specialty medical reasoning.
